text.text_translated:
Campbell talks about main characters.
First, the main character says no to a call for a journey.
But a mentor, a helpful friend, appears and helps the main character.
So, the main character goes into a new, special world where the journey starts.

Next, the main character passes tests.
They fight bad people and meet friends.
These things help the main character get ready for their biggest hard test.

For Luke, Obi-Wan is the mentor.
His friends are Han Solo and the robots R2D2 and C3PO.
Darth Vader is the bad person.
This all happens inside the special world of the Death Star.
